term.title: spontaneous emission

item.text: That mode of emission which occurs even in the absence of a perturbing external electromagnetic field. The transition between states, n and m, is governed by the Einsteincoefficient of spontaneous emission, Am.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2223. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2277 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122223)
